name: Monolith (itch) (DanPos)
description:
"Monolith" was made in 48 hours as part of a collab video with a series of game dev YouTubers in partnership with Synty Studio.

Monolith is a top down resource-gathering, story reading game. I'm a bit sad I didn't have time to get a more interesting core loop in place, you can find out why I struggled with this so much in the video below!

In the end I added the Monolith objects to tell a very short story which may or may not be any good haha.

You can check out the collab video here: [INSERT VIDEO LINK]

You can check out all the other game entries here:

  • Galactic Gas Station - Thomas Stewart - https://thomas-stewart.itch.io/galactic-gas-station
  • Oxy-Gone - Nathan Rohner - https://nathanrohner.itch.io/oxy-gone
  • Station - Silverlybee - https://silverlybee.itch.io/station
  • Rhythm Defence - LeGingerDev - https://legingerdev.itch.io/rhythm-defence

Instructions

  • Left click moves your hovercraft.
  • Left click on a resource to mine it.
  • Left click on a monolith to read the story.
